actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The gray render makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (2d12 + 4 damage) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, the target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4 damage) slashing damage. If the target is {@condition prone} an additional 7 (2d6 damage) bludgeoning damage is dealt to the target.
